answers.answer: Congrats dear. She will be ok. In my prayers.

question: I had gestational diabetes and because my meds quit working the dr decided to induce me at 38 weeks which was yesterday.   I was 2 cm and 60% when I arrived.   I was having mild contractions.   They started pitocin and it took about 3 hours to dialate to 3.  An hr (1 pm) later I was 4 cm and 80% so the dr broke my water.   I had my baby girl at 5:17.  My induction took about 8 hrs.  It was well worth it.  She was 8 lbs 1 oz and 19 1/2 in.  They said if I would have went to 40 weeks she would have been over 10 lbs.  Her lungs were fine and they monitored her sugars for 12 hours and she did great.  The dr detected a heart murmur and ordered an echocardiogram.  We will have the results tomorrow.   Good luck to the rest of the mommies to be.
title: details of my induction
